titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the tariffs of engines to be installed in work trucks.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty-free treatment of engines to be installed in work trucks.
